problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, ∠A = N_1, BC = N_2, the radius of ⊙C is N_3, point P is the point on the hypotenuse AB, passing point P is a tangent PQ of ⊙C (Point Q is the tangent point), then the minimum value of the line segment PQ is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接CP、CQ；如图所示:∵PQ是⊙C的切线,∴CQ⊥PQ,∠CQP=90°,根据勾股定理得:PQ²=CP²-CQ²,∴当PC⊥AB时,线段PQ最短,∵在Rt△ACB中,∠A=30°,BC=2,∴AB=2BC=4,AC=2√{3},∴CP\frac{AC\cdotBC}{AB}=\frac{2√{3}}{2}=√{3},∴PQ√{CP^{2}-CQ^{2}}=√{3-1}=√{2},∴PQ的最小值是√{2},故选:C．
